title: This is a beautifully renovated and maintained corner unit
description: This is a beautifully renovated and maintained corner unit at the Lenox Condominium. This unit is on the southeast corner of the building with great light and views from three bay windows. The kitchen and bathroom have all been completely renovated. The kitchen has custom cabinets, stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops. There is an entry vestibule that provides an elegant introduction to the bedroom on one end and kitchen, living room and dining area on the other. The living room includes an original decorative mantle, ceiling fan, two bay windows and fantastic southern views. The bedroom has two large closets, ceiling fan, another large bay window and a full bathroom. The association now allows individual owners to install central air conditioning and washer/dryer with prior approval by the board, and many owners have installed them. The Lenox Condominium was designed by famed New York architects Clinton and Russell. It was built in 1920 and renovated into condos in 2004-5. The units have large scale rooms, high ceilings, lots of windows and most units have their original architectural elements. It is a Doorman building and is centrally located at the southern end of Mid-town Village in the Washington Square West Neighborhood. It is 2 blocks from the great shops, restaurants, theatres and night life of Midtown Village, Walnut Street and the Avenue of the Arts. It is also just a few blocks from Thomas Jefferson and Pennsylvania Hospitals. There are many public transportation options within a few blocks of the Lenox. The condo fees include a 24/7 door staff, heat, hot water and high-speed internet. The owners pay their own electric and Cable TV. The building offers additional storage for a small fee, and there are many gym options within 2-3 blocks. It is a pet friendly building.

title: Welcome to 304 S 10th Street Unit B
description: Welcome to 304 S 10th Street Unit B in the Washington Square West neighborhood. This elegant 1 bedroom + den is located on the 2nd floor of a historic townhouse which was converted to a 4-unit boutique condominium building in 2016. The main living area, with a charming wood-burning fireplace, is spacious and open to the kitchen which has granite counters and stainless steel appliances. Overlooking 10th Street, the main bedroom has a grand scale feel with high ceilings, a chandelier, oversized windows, and a custom outfitted walk-in closet. The den is the perfect guest room or home office and has an en-suite bathroom with a tub/shower combo and single vanity sink and has a stackable washer/dryer. This unit also includes a storage locker located in the basement of the building. This fantastic location is surrounded by neighborhood favorite restaurants and shops and just a few blocks from the local Whole Foods. This chic condo is the perfect slice of city living!

title: Nestled in Fitler Square sits this handsome first floor 1 bed, 1 bath
description: Nestled in Fitler Square sits this handsome first floor 1 bed, 1 bath bi-level condo with private outdoor space! Thoughtfully maintained and recent updates make this home move-in ready! Walk inside the large front hall and enjoy the high ceilings and rich wood flooring as you are drawn into the open living space. Recessed lighting and large windows help to illuminate the living and dining area. Built-in bookshelves flank the ornate working fireplace and offer a cozy and charming ambience to gather with friends.  The updated kitchen features stainless steel appliances, built-in range and microwave, granite countertops and most importantly, access to a two-tiered private patio space. Enjoy grilling outside and dine al fresco under the cafe lights as the back patio oasis transports you back to your favorite outdoor cafe.  No exterior access to patio from street for optimal security/privacy. Back inside the bedroom level houses a laundry nook with stacked washer and dryer,  updated bath with stylish tile flooring and marble top vanity and a generously sized bedroom with ample closet space and windows that look out to the back patio.  The unit maximizes storage space, including the closet turned pottery studio by the current owner and some additional shared storage space in the basement. The condo building has rooftop access that could have a shared rooftop deck built with exceptional city skyline views. Located next door to Bacchus market and 2 blocks from Fitler Square farmers market, Schuylkill dog park and river trail. This location has amazing walkability to UPenn, HUP and CHOP along with neighborhood staples and restaurants including Cotoletta Fitler Square, Ambrosia, Rival Brothers Coffee, Pizzata Pizzeria and more!

title: Just off the gorgeous tree-lined Spruce Street
description:
Just off the gorgeous tree-lined Spruce Street and hidden behind the grand historic facade lies the secret gardens of the condo community known as Strickland Row. Here is your chance to own your very own "hidden gem.” Named for the famous Philadelphian Architect William Strickland, the association is made up of a group of six similar mansion-style homes that were converted to condos. Access this residence through the designated mansion connected to the manicured gardens with a private entrance to your very own, 1 bedroom 1 bath home. The residence complete with high ceilings, moldings and wood floors is very grand. There is a side kitchen and full bath. The bedroom has an oversized walk in closet and storage above.
Enjoy a different water view right here in Philly by beginning your day pool side! This condo comes with an in-ground pool complete with your very own maintenance staff. Take a break for lunch and fire up the grill. You can actually have a grill in this upscale condominium community and dine in one of three courtyards. Looking for a skyline view? Take lunch up to the roof top and enjoy a magnificent 360 degree view of the Center City skyline. Grab your bike from the west side courtyard complete with secure bike storage and hop onto one of the dedicated bike lanes right outside your door, ride to the Schuylkill Bank Trails and coast along the river. Relax by your wood burning fireplace and take in the beauty of your home. Make no mistake, this condo has it all conveniently located to all the major hospitals, restaurants, museums and shopping. Make this your home.

title: This is an elegant entry vestibule unit at The Lenox Condo

It is a SE corner unit on a high floor with lots of windows, including 3 bay windows, great light and fantastic views. This unit is the largest one-bedroom in the building and has the same square footage as most two bedrooms units. The vestibule, large rooms and high ceilings give the home a grand look and feel. One side of the vestibule leads to a spacious living room with built in bookcases and two bay windows, a formal dining room and a beautiful kitchen. The fully renovated kitchen includes custom cabinets, stainless steel appliances, ceramic tile flooring and granite countertops. The other side of the vestibule has a huge bedroom that has a den, built in bookcases, walk-in-closet and a bay window. The master bedroom has a closet organizing system. The home has a split unit air conditioning system. The Lenox was designed by famed New York architects Clinton and Russell. It was built in 1920 and renovated into condos in 2004-5. It is also just a few blocks from Thomas Jefferson and Pennsylvania Hospitals. There are many gym, parking and public transportation options nearby. The Lenox has a large central laundry room, but the association now allows owners to install individual units within owner condos, with some restrictions and installation requirements.

title: 2 bed apartment in West Philly
description:
Available April 1, 2023.
Beautiful 2 bedroom on Hazel near 52nd
842 ft2
$1340 rent
Electric/Gas/Internet are tenant responsibility
Water is included
The apartment is the entire first floor of a large 100-year-old house.
One big bedroom and one small room that could be used as an office /guest room / bedroom for a minimalist.
Mud room with direct access to backyard.
Hardwood, tile floors (no carpet).
Apartment features include:
-pictured furniture included
-plenty of closet space
-Windows on 3 sides of apartment
-Free shared laundry in the basement - 2 washers, 1 dryer
- Radiator heating. Dedicated hot water heater and boiler with individual utility account (resident only pays for their specific use for electric and natural gas)
-Appliances are fairly new (2015).
-decorative ‘fireplace’
No dogs.
Cats allowed with a pet deposit
Neighborhood features:
Near the most reliable transit line - the MFL.
Street parking
One block from Malcolm X
Many businesses, restaurants very close on S 52nd St and Baltimore Ave.
Mariposa Food Co-op, other groceries in walking distance.
Apartment is managed by the owner who is responsive to maintenance issues and lives nearby. Nice neighbors, nice block.
Application process:
1. phone screening
2. rental application
3. view apartment
4. credit /background check (~$42) (You are guaranteed the apartment if you are paying this as long as the report looks good.)
5. Lease signing
6. Move in April 1
Application requirements:
Potential tenant will pay $42 for application fee.
If two tenants, both need to apply.
Credit score of 650+. No past evictions.
Must make 3X monthly rent so that it is affordable for you.
References including from current landlord / property manager and housemates. (provide contact info).
First month rent and 2 months rent deposit required to sign lease.
The lease is offered on a yearly basis. Preference may be given to applicants who are interested in living longer-term.
This is an equal housing opportunity, regardless of age, color, ethnicity, nationality, religion, gender, orientation or disability or any other demographic not mentioned. You will be more than welcome as a resident if you can appreciate living in a 100 year home, demonstrate respect for the other residents and the property itself, and be thoughtful and considerate regarding noise.
If interested, please reply to this post and include some information about yourself and what brings you to West Philly.

title: Make this New York-style loft in the heart of Logan Square
description:
Make this New York-style loft in the heart of Logan Square with a 1-car deeded garage spot your new home! This great condo features high ceilings, original architectural details, exposed ducts and hardwood floors throughout. The home boasts an open concept-living area with exposed brick, oversized windows with Eastern exposure and exciting city skyline views, and is perfect for entertaining. The roomy kitchen provides generous counter space, modern cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops and a large island with ample seating space. The main level also includes two large bedrooms with lots of closet space, a full marble bath, a laundry closet with a full-size stacked washer/dryer and a coat closet. A custom metal staircase adorns the stairs leading to the main bedroom, complete with a large walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom featuring a spacious walk-in shower. 2200 Arch St also provides amazing amenities, including a 24-hour monitored entrance, concierge, on-site garage parking, fitness center, Arch Gourmet convenience store on the ground floor and it is pet friendly. The location is extremely convenient and walkable, just steps away from Trader Joe’s and GIANT stores, the Schuylkill River Trail, close to 30th Street Station, Rittenhouse and Logan Squares, many restaurants, cafes, shopping and the museums including The Franklin Institute and The Barnes. Easy access to I-76 and I-676 makes this location perfect for commuters and city dwellers alike. Disclaimer: Property is listed for sale and might be sold during the lease period. Tenants would have to agree to showings during their lease.

title: Discover this charming property in Philadelphia!!
description:
Center City West is a neighborhood within Center City, the downtown district of Philadelphia. This urban hub is one of Philadelphia's most desirable neighborhoods. The Center City West neighborhood encompasses some of the city's biggest attractions including the shopping, financial, and museum districts. It attracts its residents by not only hosting some of the city's leading institutions of art, science, and history, but also with its upscale restaurants and a booming nightlife. The options are endless: Laugh tears of joy at the Helium Comedy Club, have a shopping spree at the Shops at Liberty Place, or get a spectacular panoramic view 57 stories above the ground at the One Liberty Observation Deck. Nearby Rittenhouse Square is a popular spot for festivals and farmers markets while the Schuylkill Banks has excellent riverside running and biking trails with a view.

title: At last--the first boutique condo conversion in the Penn Alexander ca
description: At last--the first boutique condo conversion in the Penn Alexander catchment area. These large homes provide the gracious scale and original details that are the hallmark of the neighborhood's Victorian houses, while offering all the right updates, including all-new kitchens, bathrooms, HVAC and the ease of maintenance associated with condo living. No aluminum-and-stucco boxes here; the developer took care to preserve the lovely character of the elegant Victorian twin building, both inside and out. And it could not be in a more idyllic location: half a block from Clark Park and within blocks of all the neighborhood hot spots. The perfect alternative to renting, and without the hefty monthly fees that come with larger condo buildings, Unit 2 is a super-spacious one-bedroom that fills the entire floor and boasts 12 windows. With plenty of space for a dedicated dining area, the large, wide-open living area has a pretty bay window, new hardwood flooring and recessed lighting and leads into the spacious kitchen featuring a Frigidaire stainless steel appliance package, Shaker-style maple cabinetry, wood-grain ceramic tile flooring, granite countertops and an extra-deep stainless steel undermount sink. The humungous bedroom also has new hardwood flooring, closets galore, a large separate area for a home office, dressing area or yoga space, and a stylish en suite bathroom with large vanity, subway tile shower surround with inlaid mosaic tile stone border and conveniently located stackable washer/dryer.
